name: The Margot
description: The Margot is Compass' permanent supportive housing program where families live in private apartments and receive wrap-around support. Services provided: - Bilingual one-one-one case management to address client goals, needs, and challenges. - Additional supportive services such as behavioral health services. - Childcare and children's programming, alongside a friendly children's center.
